about.title: The story behind

why.title: Why this portfolio exists
why.text: Every Lovable project is a small experiment, a piece of passion transformed into code. This portfolio is my way of collecting and sharing these digital dreams â€“ not perfect, but authentic and full of attention to detail.

for.title: Who it's meant for
for.text: For everyone interested in the magic of digital design. For inspiration seekers, for Lovable enthusiasts, and for all who believe that technology can be beautiful and human.

unique.title: What makes it unique
unique.text: It's not just a project collection â€“ it's a living diary of my creative journey. Each project shows not only the final result, but also the thoughts, emotions, and small discoveries behind it.

about.subtitle: Every pixel, every animation, every interaction was crafted with love for detail.
